constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/00569/HOU (Demolition of existing lean-to. and erection of single-storey side extension and  replacement of fenestration/door of existing rear elevation with bi-fold doors) dated 24/02/2021. Amendment to consist of reduction in the length and area of extension and change above proposed rear window to better match the existing London Stock brickwork
decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 21/00569/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:SMILAK - FE - E+P - 010 - P01 Existing and Proposed Front Elevation P1SMILAK - RE - E+P - 008 - P01 Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation P1SMILAK - RF - E+P - 007 - P01 Existing and Proposed Roof Plan P1SMILAK - SE - E+P - 009 - P01 Existing and Proposed South Elevation P1SMILAK - SP - P - 003- P1 Proposed Block Plan P1SMILAK - SP - P - 005 - P1 Proposed Site Plan P1SMILAK - SP - P - 006 - P1 Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan P1Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
